content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Research Lab Complex (around position 0.5, 30.5)
Consists of:
- Lab with automation and logistic science pack inputs
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) moving items from chest to lab
- Wooden chest at (0.5, 31.5) storing science packs

### Copper Cable Production Line (around position 9.5, 11.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5, 11.5) for producing copper cables
- Input wooden chest at (7.5, 11.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving items between assembling machine and output chest
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing iron plates, copper cables and electronic circuits
- Additional storage chests at:
  - (14.5, 11.5) storing iron and copper plates
  - (16.5, 11.5) storing iron plates

### Power Generation System (around position -7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-3.5, 24.5)
- Small electric pole network connecting components

### Smelting Area (around position 0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces currently inactive but contain some copper plate output

# ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Placement Issues
- Multiple attempts to place inserters in occupied tiles - check target location is clear before placing
- Frequent misaligned inserter removals and replacements - plan inserter placement carefully to avoid rework

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine shows "not connected to power network" - ensure proper electrical pole connections
- Boiler running out of fuel - maintain steady coal supply
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" - verify pipe connections and fluid flow

### Production Issues
- Assembling machine showing "NO_POWER" status - verify electrical connections
- Assembling machine showing "ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE" - ensure proper material supply chain
- Some chests reaching capacity ("chest is full" warning) - implement better item management or expand storage

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels to prevent "Could not insert: No coal" errors
- Ensure proper material flow between storage, production and usage points
